tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Usage_Reduction (
    reduction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    technology_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    date_installed DATE,
    amount_saved FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (technology_id) REFERENCES Water_Saving_Technologies(technology_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_name VARCHAR(50),
    user_email VARCHAR(50),
    organization VARCHAR(50),
    date_joined DATE
);

CREATE TABLE UserFeedback (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_date TIMESTAMP,
    technology_id INT REFERENCES WaterSavingTechnologies(id)
);
